name: Mc Dood Goes To Space
description:
Your grand  Jelly Bean collecting adventure in the Mc Dood universe begins here.

Welcome, Meat Freak. To Mc Dood Goes To Space! You'll be tasked with venturing to unknown planets in search for Jelly Beans so that you can pay off your hospital bills

Who is Mc Dood? Don't worry about it!

Why does everyone call me meat related things? Stop asking questions!
